org.easybatch.core.reader

Class QueueRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.reader.QueueRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class QueueRecordReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordReader
    A convenient RecordReader that reads record from a BlockingQueue.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
